name: Operator (itch) (Wikkit)
description:
Aid the repair agent through the rogue drone environment to reach the end.

Use left-click for the scanner to reveal control consoles, useful pickups, and reveal enemies.

Scanning an enemy will reveal its weaknesses and enable the repair agent to aim better.

Use right-click to hack enemies. Its effect is different for each enemy.

If the agent doesn't know where to find supplies, they will search for them on their own.
